item.title: [PI] Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:6, topic:459897”]In the player class declare the boolean, “thieving”. Lowercase please, it’s proper conventions.[/quote]Oh yeah, uh, solved… :P.
I found out how to stop it from giving you money in general, so now idc if they auto click it. They won’t get any benefits.

Just use the first one you were going to do, it will work if you do it correctly, but having the player moved to a bank when their inventory is full would be quite annoying.[/quote]okay I changed it back to the original and added what you said. But I still get the same error…?

item.title: [PI] Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:459897”]You haven’t created the variable Thieving, and you need to implement that within your actual thieving class, otherwise it’s useless.[/quote]How would I create the variable Thieving?
Also, before I read it I was just going to switch it to this:

if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) { c.sendMessage("Your inventory is full."); c.getPA().movePlayer(2201, 3259, 0); //to a bank return; }
but now this is the error I get:

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1275: error: unreachable statement if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
help?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thieving
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You haven’t created the variable Thieving, and you need to implement that within your actual thieving class, otherwise it’s useless.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay so my server has thieving stall that give you a item(Cake) and then money, but lets say a new player comes along as uses auto clicker on thieving staff, when there inventory is full of cakes and money, it keeps giving them money, BUT! The money about double or tripples or idk but it give them 2m. I wanted to remove it from giving them money completely… Now I though this would be a simple fix so I went though all of my files searching the stall id codes, and I found them, but it doesn’t say any of them even give you money…? Can I get some help with removing them from giving you money.

P.S. This is my code for them to not be able to thieve anymore on full inventory:

if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) { c.sendMessage("Your inventory is full."); c.Thieving = false; return; }
This is my error:

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1277: error: cannot find symbol c.Thieving = false; ^ symbol: variable Thieving location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
I’ve tried “thieving” & “getThieving” neither worked… Anyone know?

Read full topic
